page.title: 03CHURCHES IN CHARD
page.content: There are 5 churches in Chard.The denominations are Baptist,Methodist Catholic and two Church of England. St.Mary's Church is located in Church Street.It was built in 1400 and took 45 years to be completed.It has a seating capacity of 370 people.There is a choir of 25-30 ,mostly women or girls.There are 8 bells.The clock chimes every quarter hour.It is very popular for weddings because of the well-kept grounds and the bells. The Methodist Church is located in the middle of Chard.It was built in 1895 and took 4 years to finish.The Church has a seating capacity of 200 people.
